name: Eremite - Demo
description:
Eremite is a first-person shooter where you are a lone human on a planet filled with Robots. The demo doesn't feature a story game but there will be a compelling story line to follow in the final release.

The demo only features a wave gamemode where you have to fight of waves of enemies to progress. There are lots of different weapons to choose from and a variety of enemies to defeat.

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Jumping - Space

Double Jump - Space x2

Shoot - Mouse 1

Grappling Hook - C

Grappling Hook Release - C or Space

Reload - R

Pause - ESC

Be the first one to defeat all 50 waves and you get to add a new feature yourself.

Or collect every available weapon :)
